cafe.name: RBSB Cafe
cafe.description: RBSB Caf√© is a casual and affordable spot offering a diverse menu featuring Malaysian, Indonesian, and international dishes. It's the perfect place for anyone seeking delicious and wallet-friendly food.

promotions.discount: Collect 10 stamps to get RM6.00 off your next meal

menu.description: A traditional Malaysian dish with rice and chicken
